text:
Hey, after updating the CLI, I'm getting this error:
```--- theme-assets-project failed with the following error ---
[ERROR] `rendering-stack.zip` deployment package is too large to deploy. Please reduce package size and try again.```

I once got this error while trying to deploy the react-module-boilerplate from cms-react repository. I don't think I did anything special to fix this. You can recheck the project structure. Also try to deploy after a while, it should be automatically fixed.
thanks, <@U06RPR9M70V>, another deploy didn't work but I'll wait longer and try again
